mapper.insert:
insert into mall.base_user(phone, password, openid, type, remark, customer_info_id, nickname, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, del_flag, version) values
(#{entity.phone}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.openid}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.customerInfoId}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.version})

insert into mall.base_user(phone, password, openid, type, remark, customer_info_id, nickname, create_time, update_time, create_by, update_by, del_flag, version) values
(#{entity.phone}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.openid}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.customerInfoId}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.version})
on duplicate key update phone = values(phone) , password = values(password) , openid = values(openid) , type = values(type) , remark = values(remark) , customer_info_id = values(customer_info_id) , nickname = values(nickname) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time) , create_by = values(create_by) , update_by = values(update_by) , del_flag = values(del_flag) , version = values(version)
